author: Sokomine
long_description:
# Controls:
**Store a new pattern** (block type and orientation) with **Aux1 + right-click** (or shift + right-click; Aux1 is easier if you're flying).

**Left-click** with replacer to **replace the block** you're pointing at with the stored pattern in the stored orientation.

**Right-click** to place a block with stored pattern and orientation as if you would be wielding that block.

Use **Aux1 + left-click** to get to a formspec where you can access a **history of stored patterns** and change the **mode** of the replacer.

# Available modes:
1. normal replacement: replace material (i.e. *default:tree*), shape (i.e. a *stair*) and orientation (i.e. *upside-down, facing southward*)
2. material only: replace the material but keep shape and orientation - useful when you've built something out of one material and now decide that another material might be better
3. shape only: replace shape and orientation but keep the material

# Inspector tool:
Click with the inspector tool on nodes, mobs, dropped items etc. about which you want to get more information.

# Note:
The mod as such does not depend on any particular game. If you don't have the materials to craft the replacer or inspector, you'll have to add suitable crafting receipes or use /giveme replacer:replacer etc.
